comment: Prof Cranfill is amazing! She is extremely understanding and lenient if you need additional time to turn something in. Her exams aren't that difficult as they are often just variations of problems from the textbook or class. Lectures can be a bit unorganized as she isn't the best with technology though, so it's best to read up prior to class.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Gives good feedback--Caring

comment: She gives out SO much unrealistic work that resembles NOTHING that she does in class. This class probably takes me 4-5 hours outside of class just to complete all the work. She gives out tests that she may or may not even know the answers to and is a very tough grader. Avoid her if you wish to have any time for anything else.

Extremely caring professor. She will go out of her way to help you. Lectures are a little disorganized but typically follow the powerpoint. Tests are tough, but she will help you! Would absolutely take again!

I had a horrible semester with way too much on my plate and I was about 5 or 6 labs behind at one point, along with the final project due date coming very soon. Professor Cranfill took out from her personal time to meet with me outside of class for days in a row for hours and hours to help me catch up. Very caring professor!

A very caring professor who really makes you want to improve on the subject. I have liked few professors as people as much as I liked her, but MAN her class was hard. Definitely read the material before lecture, even if you never do that for other classes. Her tests were particularly challenging and lecture was disorganized.
